jcommander-addons 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT API

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters
Provides the basic classes all converters extend and use.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.crypto
Provides javax.crypto converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.lang
Provides java.lang converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.math
Provides java.math converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.net
Provides java.net converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.net.ssl
Provides javax.net.ssl converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.nio
Provides java.nio converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.nio.charset
Provides java.nio.charset converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.nio.file
Provides java.nio.file converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.nio.file.attribute
Provides java.nio.file.attribute converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.security
Provides java.security converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.security.cert
Provides java.security.cert converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.sql
Provides java.sql converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.sql.microsoft
Provides java.sql converters for Microsoft SQL Server.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.sql.mysql
Provides java.sql converters for MySQL.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.sql.oracle
Provides java.sql converters for Oracle.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.time
Provides java.time converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.util
Provides java.util converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.xml
Provides javax.xml converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.xml.datatype
Provides javax.xml.datatype converters.
com.garygregory.jcommander.converters.xml.namespace
Provides javax.xml.namespace converters.

The goal of the JCommander-Addons project is to provide any and all JCommander converters and validators an advanced applications will need.

Feel free to submit a pull-request and examine the build site.

Using JCommander-Addons Converters

To use a converter, specify the converter attribue with a class value: 
@Parameter(names = { "--cipher" }, converter = CipherConverter.class)
private Cipher cipher;
